name: Safety Driving Simulator: Car
description: Safety Driving Simulator: Car is a driving simulator engaging and enjoyable that teaches the basics of driving immersing the player in a detailed and realistic urban environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 GHz AMD or Intel Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 7000, ATI Radeon X1850 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I'm confident that I'll never crash in real life after I played this game!!!!!
well what can i say one of the best driving games i have ever played and well worth the price.
